I poured my life into Overwatch 1 just for them to spit on it, sling it around, and rub it in the nastiest smelling play-doh these crayon eating slags could find. Do NOT support this game in any capacity, it's just a husk of something that was once worth even a passing glance.

Despite all the mess, it is the only engaging fast paced shooter in its league. Nothing else like it. Despite the weird review bombing going on here on twitter. you can pretty much pick up the game and play without spending a penny, and you can earn all the heroes through basic playtime.

(Disclaimer, have been playing since the closed beta. 1500+ hours) They want you to pay $20+ for the PVE content they falsely advertised by saying it was going to be full of skill trees and stuff. To elaborate, they want you to pay $20+ to play missions on maps that were already in the game, full of PVE robots that were already featured in other PVE content. Voiced over by existing NPCs. The campaign has nothing new except voice over. Defend a point with 3 random teammates without getting to choose your hero for 15 minutes of voice over "campaign" content. I haven't been this eye-wateringly bored in over a year. Please save me from this terrible, horrible company. (FYI the hit-reg is terrible I can't play the sniper cause I have video proof about 40% of my shots no-reg)

almost 700 hours that how much i have playing overwatch since the start at season 1.ive seen some bad times in overwatch, goats, double shield,thickcree, and even the carwash meta along with the like 6 reworks sym has gotten. but... you lied to us FOR YEARS. lied about the entire ow2 pve. drip fed us incredibly exciting teaser videos and gameplay videos of a game we would never touch. blizzard you probably had already canned the real Ow2 PVE before you even released the very first teaser for the pve talent tree and openly talked about the OVERWATCH 2 Campaign...... this... is absolutely unacceptable. ive been here all this time. ive spent so much money supporting the games development. in fact i have over 90% of all skins for every hero only missing a few event only skins or charity skins. but i as a player and as a content creator feel betrayed. im just glad i can finally say what has been on my mind openly and share my dissatisfaction with what you guys have done to us as a community.

I have to say something about this game, it's not real that Blizzard always hurt us on this game, Blizzard always hurt the poorness and just steal from our pocket
From Season 1 of OverWatch 2, I start buying the game pass of this game, but I just have some basic experience of this game, not feeling as I got more than the free playing gamer, and till now, Blizzard give just one way to got the new play mode, the sucking PVE mode? No, that's bull xxxx, I have bought last season, don't let me buy anymore in this season, I have already got the coins WHY should I could not use them for buying the new mode in this season?
Stop cheating on us!

400 REAIS EM DLC SENDO Q UMA DELAS Ã‰ O MODO HISTÃ“RIA KKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKKK
um bom jogo mas e foda q tem muita gente burra jogando achando q e so hentai

The gameplay & mechanics of Overwatch has always been fantastic.  People aren't wrong to be salty about the broken promise from the developer regarding PvE.  PvE was promised, and later dropped.  

Another point of contention is that the developer changed the monetization model from OW1 to OW2.  In the original, you paid for the game, and then everything else was free.  In OW2, the game is free, but they are charging money for the skins and the premium battlepass.  No big deal, IMO.  The game itself is free, and is a lot of fun. 

Ignore the negative reviews and just play the game.

How can you play a game when they take away everything you loved about playing it? 6v6 to 5v5 now? The whole reason for this was to make the Pve. Then that was canceled? Now its this co op (which is 15 dollars). Its sad nice money grabbing I guess. This games main focus is to sell you skins and battle passes, nothing about game play or anything.

Oh you want a REAL review? Okay...

â™¥ Everything is a baffling laser light show. I could end the review right here. The first game was this and nothing has changed.
â™¦ The game still boils down to "flick your willy until everyone has ult charged, then spam on the point all at once." Casual and competitive players will find it shallow.
â™£ Nothing is well-balanced. They had to outright remove a character (Bastion) for 1 year because they couldn't balance him... when he was playable on release and throughout OW1. Roadhog was murdered in cold blood by balance patches.
â™  It's a stripped down Overwatch 1 designed to yank as much money out of paypiggy nipples as possible. "If they're dumb enough to buy the hype once, they'll do it again!" is the motto. They ripped a page out of the World of Warcraft expansion playbook.
â™¥ Battlepass garbage (see above). It would take thousands of dollars to afford everything in this game. That includes playable heroes. Imagine a game's meta being defined by a character you have to shell out tons of cash to even access.
â™¦ The only feedback Blizzard has ever taken to heart regarding this game is the campaign lamenting a lack of black female characters... and even that was probably something they astroturfed in-house (like the Blender porn they were caught commissioning.) 
â™£ Jeff Kaplan AKA Tigole is a massive jew hack fraud. He's gone now but nothing he ruined was ever fixed (such as Roadhog.)
â™  The PVE game mode that was allegedly the entire reason Overwatch 1 had to be re-developed was cancelled, then resurrected, then revealed to be a hastily-made hackjob to try and salvage PR. 

I played this game for 300+ hours. I hit the highest competitive rank, then refused to play anymore when Blizzard demanded my phone number... which they still do.
This game is a mess. Blizzard is a mess. If you have any hope for this game even with the Microsoft acquisition then you have rocks in your head, just look at what they did to Halo.
Go play Warcraft 3, Starcraft 1 (and I guess 2) and Diablo 2. Pretend Blizzard died after.

trash pos money grabbing game. dont waste your money
Team Fortress 2 (https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/) is STILL a better game and what you should be playing instead. Pro tip, you dont have to pay money for gameplay

A shadow of its former self that disrespects your time and your money. Preordered the original back in the day, played it a ton and even though loot boxes weren't an ideal system, at least it was free cosmetics you could get for just playing. Now they just want your money for every single little thing, 20 bucks for legendaries, battle passes that take too long to complete and filled with garbage, and most importantly, this isn't anything but a sequel to the monetization system, not the game itself.

Stay away from this pile of trash and just look at the porn if anything, at least that's higher quality and a real free to play.
